ivardefs.name: halfLife
ivardefs.desc: Half life - for a non-natural nuclide.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: Substance identifier for each non-natural or radioisotope.

ivardefs.name: molecularWeight
ivardefs.desc: The molecular weight or weight range (for proteins, polymers or nucleic acids).

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: Substance name for each non-natural or radioisotope.

ivardefs.name: substitution
ivardefs.desc: The type of isotopic substitution present in a single substance.

properties.desc: Applicable for single substances that contain a radionuclide or a non-natural isotopic ratio.
